unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Upgrade**
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Upgrade

unnormalised: Yo, influencer folks! Tired of generic follower stats that make as much sense as trying to explain the plot of a Bollywood movie to your grandma? Well, good news! New follower analytics tools are hitting the market, specifically geared towards understanding the Indian audience.
normalised: Yo, influencer folks! Tired of generic follower stats that make as much sense as trying to explain the plot of a Bollywood movie to your grandma? Well, good news! New follower analytics tools are hitting the market, specifically geared towards understanding the Indian audience.

unnormalised: We're talking granular data, yaar! Forget just age and location, these platforms now dig into things like preferred content formats (think short Reels vs. long-form YouTube videos), engagement around specific festivals like Onam, and even the best time to post that drool-worthy biryani pic to maximize reach.
normalised: We are talking granular data, yaar! Forget just age and location, these platforms now dig into things like preferred content formats (think short Reels versus long-form YouTube videos), engagement around specific festivals like Onam, and even the best time to post that drool-worthy biryani pic to maximize reach.

unnormalised: Leading the charge is IIT-Bombay graduate Rohan Verma, whose startup, "Desi Data," promises a 30% increase in engagement using their AI-powered insights. Early adopters are seeing a serious return, with brands like "Sarees & Stories" reporting a 2x jump in sales after tailoring their content to follower preferences.
normalised: Leading the charge is I I T-Bombay graduate Rohan Verma, whose startup, "Desi Data," promises a thirty percent increase in engagement using their A I-powered insights. Early adopters are seeing a serious return, with brands like "Sarees and Stories" reporting a two x jump in sales after tailoring their content to follower preferences.

unnormalised: So, ditch the guesswork and start really understanding your audience. After all, knowing what kind of content your followers crave is the secret ingredient to social media success – as crucial as the masala in a perfect biryani! Expect more updates soon!
normalised: So, ditch the guesswork and start really understanding your audience. After all, knowing what kind of content your followers crave is the secret ingredient to social media success – as crucial as the masala in a perfect biryani! Expect more updates soon!
